name: Duct Ape
description:
Made using the Godot engine in 55 hours for the Mini Jame Gam #16!

note - the game runs best when downloaded

You have been trapped in a lab by evil scientists, escape your cell using the air ducts and wreak havoc on the lab!

Controls:

WASD/Arrow keys - move

Space/Enter - enter/exit air vent, destroy objects

How to play:

Enter and exit air ducts from the vents (visible by the shadows on the floor)

Destroy computers to earn chaos, be careful the sound doesn't attract the guards!

Destroying multiple computers gives a combo bonus, which resets when you enter a vent

The game ends if you are caught by the guards or destroy all the objects
